com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.affine

Class FlipHorizontalTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.AffineTransform
      • com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.affine.FlipHorizontalTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class FlipHorizontalTransform
extends AffineTransform
    An AffineTransform that performs a horizontal mirroring of a shape or image about its vertical center-line.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
